questions.question: Qual è il plurale di 'bella' e 'interessante'?
questions.explanation: The noun 'donne' is feminine plural, so the adjective must also be in the feminine plural form.

questions.question: Qual è il verbo corretto per 'loro costruiscono'?
questions.explanation: We need to use the third plural person 'loro' of the present tense of the verb 'costruire'.
